featured.text: The city declared a state of emergency and began aerial spraying of a pesticide to kill the mosquitoes, even though residents argued that the pesticide could be more dangerous than the disease.
In 1790, President George Washington declared that the federal government would reside in a district “not exceeding ten miles square … on the river Potomac.”

definition.zh_def: 宣告；聲明；正式宣布某事
definition.en_def: To make a formal statement or announcement.
definition.example: The government will declare a state of emergency.
